thread.title: Barclaycard US Offers NFL Fans A Chance To Win A Trip To Super Bowl 50 In The San Francisco Bay Area

author: cbs8
title: Barclaycard US Offers NFL Fans A Chance To Win A Trip To Super Bowl 50 In The San Francisco Bay Area
text:
Barclaycard US
The #FandomNation50 Giveaway Helps Fans Elevate their NFL Experience
WILMINGTON, Del. , Oct. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- To help fans celebrate the Super Bowl's golden anniversary this season, Barclaycard US has kicked off a special game and sweepstakes promotion where fans have the opportunity to win a trip for two to Super Bowl 50 in the San Francisco Bay Area , as well as once-in-a-lifetime experiences, regular season game tickets, NFL merchandise, and much more.
Barclaycard US issues The NFL Extra Points Credit Card – the Official Rewards Credit Card of the NFL – and is proud to offer yet another way for fans across the country to elevate their NFL experience. Now through Nov. 26, 2015 , fans can enter The NFL Extra Points #FandomNation50 Giveaway.
To play, fans go to the online game page, www.fandomnation50.com , and try to match three of The NFL Extra Points Credit Cards bearing their favorite team's logo. Fans that play will receive an entry to win one of 50 instant win prizes that will be awarded daily for 50 days:
One $1,000 NFLShop.com Gift Card Four $500 NFLShop.com Gift Cards Six pairs of tickets to a 2015 NFL Game Five VIP NFL Experiences Five $250 NFLShop.com Gift Cards Eight Tailgate Prize Packages at NFLShop.com 21 $100 NFLShop.com Gift Cards Every fan who plays the instant win game will automatically be entered into the Grand Prize Drawing which includes two tickets to Super Bowl 50 on Feb. 7, 2016 in the San Francisco Bay Area , round-trip airfare and hotel accommodations.
Official rules for The NFL Extra Points #FandomNation50 Giveaway are available at www.extrapointsgiveaway.com .
Fans can also keep up with the latest NFL Extra Points news on Twitter: www.twitter.com/NFLExtraPoints ; and Facebook: www.facebook.com/NFLExtraPoints .
"Many football fans dream of winning a trip to the Super Bowl," said Kirsten Osland , director of financial institution and affinity partnerships, Barclaycard US. "In keeping with our commitment to help fans elevate their NFL experience, we're giving fans the chance to win an experience of a lifetime – a trip for two to Super Bowl 50. As the NFL celebrates the golden anniversary of the Super Bowl, it's sure to be one of the biggest sporting and entertainment events of the year."
The NFL Extra Points Credit Card is the only card that lets NFL fans earn points for everyday purchases that can be redeemed for NFL rewards like game tickets, exclusive VIP experiences, NFL merchandise, NFLShop.com gift cards and more. Cardmembers can choose their own card design that includes the NFL Shield and the logos of one of the 32 teams. The card has no annual fee and offers cardmembers a 20% discount at NFLshop.com . For complete details, or to apply for the card, visit www.nflextrapoints.com .
About Barclaycard US
Headquartered in Wilmington, Del. , Barclaycard US is the fastest-growing top 10 U.S. credit card issuer. The company creates customized, co-branded credit card programs for some of the nation's most successful travel, entertainment, retail, affinity and financial institutions. The business also issues its own Barclaycard branded credit cards: Barclaycard Ring , Barclaycard Rewards , and the Barclaycard Arrival product series. For more information on Barclaycard please visit BarclaycardUS.com .
